website_summaries.verdict: The kit used in most doctors' offices to remove earwax.
pros: Owners love that there's absolutely no way to insert tip too far into the ear canal and cause damage
Reviewers rave that this kit has saved them money by eliminating the need to visit the doctor for the same service
Works for most people during first use
cons: No instructions included, but directions are easily found online
You'll need a basin to catch the wax and water

customer_reviews.title: Beware of hearing loss
customer_reviews.text: Although this product was successful at getting a large chunk of earwax out of my right ear, it also has caused a significant amount of hearing loss in both of my ears. The sound of the water was extremely loud (like sitting next to the loudspeaker at a rock concert), and I'm concerned the tube may have gone too far into my ear canal and punctured something. 24 hours after using it I still have noticeable hearing loss. At this point I can only hope my ears will eventually return to normal. I will definitely not be using this product again.
customer_reviews.author: James Williams

customer_reviews.title: Cannot Recommend
customer_reviews.text: Just did not work for me. I followed the instructions very closely. When it did not loosen anything, I did one more round. When I finished, I had water sloshing around inside my ears and it took two days for it to drain. My hearing was worse than when I started! I can not recommend this item. That was $30 down the drain. I will let the doctor do it. When they do it with their equipment, something always comes out and I can hear perfect again.
customer_reviews.author: Outta Control

customer_reviews.title: Great ear cleaner
customer_reviews.text: Love! This product! It was easy to use. My son always has a lot of ear wax and gunk that gets stuck in his ear and this removed all of it!
customer_reviews.author: Maria

customer_reviews.title: Did not work
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to irrigate my son's ears. He is 10 yrs old and he has been complaining that he had trouble hearing out of his left ear. So I checked his ear and saw a ball of wax. I tried using this to get the wax out but it was very uncomfortable for him. I used warm water like it says but he said it hurt. I did not put the tiny connector too far in fact it was only at the opening to his ear canal. I also did not think a 99 cent spray bottle with a tube attached to the end should cost $30. I do not recommend this
customer_reviews.author: Centern88

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!! Great for removing impacted, hard ear wax!!
customer_reviews.text: This works!! Our son has Down syndrome and tiny canals. We used to go see the ENT to clean out his ears but he would move around so much with the tools (metal) inside that we were worried about damage to his ear canals and eardrums. We tried a bunch of different methods but never found anything that worked effectively or quickly ... until the Elephant Ear Washer!! Took about 2 mins to clean out both ears. Wax looks gross!! So relieved to be rid of them!! Before you know this works, $30 might seem a lot for what it is but it is SO worth it!
customer_reviews.author: TwoCowboysNLilMissE

customer_reviews.title: Be careful, but it works; surely overpriced
customer_reviews.text: After going through a full bottle or two of water plus white vinegar, I finally got a ball of wax out just before I was about to give up. But my hearing was still muffled. I had been basically 100% certain that I only had wax in there muffling my hearing on and off, but I went through another bottle or two with no luck. I'm glad I stopped trying at that point, because it turns out I actually have Otitis Media with Effusion: liquid behind the eardrum, in the Eustachian tube, muffling sound sometimes. It's less common than stuck ear wax, but it's not rare: very roughly 1 in 1,000 adults per year, and far more often in children.
customer_reviews.author: ​

customer_reviews.title: Amazing, amazing
customer_reviews.text: Amazing, amazing!!!! It got this huge piece of wax out of my brothers ear. Make sure you put a softener in the ear before and then do the wash. Also use purified water and warm it up. Cold water will hurt.
customer_reviews.author: Laura swanson

customer_reviews.title: Too complicated to use and nothing special
customer_reviews.text: This device is just a glorified spray bottle with a special hose with a piece at the end that prevents you jamming it too far into your ear. With regard to use it has a long series of off putting warnings with regard how you might use it incorrectly and damage your ear. It certainly isn't worth the price. Moreover you need to keep new end tips.
customer_reviews.author: M. White

customer_reviews.title: WOW... EXCELLENT PRODUCT!  I can hear again!!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is an ear bulb on steroids. It took two bottles of water/ hydogen peroxide solution to clear my ears. That is, all of about two minutes. Also, while instructions ARE included, it was initially unclear to me how exactly to attach the cleaning tip to the bottle. A YouTube video resolved that matter quickly. Important: The instructions state to use warm water in the device, as cool water could make you dizzy. I used water that wasn't warm enough and it made me seriously dizzy almost immediately, so follow that instruction! ; )
customer_reviews.author: Marine_Engineer

customer_reviews.title: Less painful than Dr office
customer_reviews.text: I bought this 5 years ago for my husband who has excessive ear wax and hated how painful the ENT Dr's procedure was. He loves it. I found a "recipe" to use: about 1/8 cup white vinegar and 2 drops of baby shampoo, then fill the bottle with body temperature water. It never irritates his ears and always works. This week I paid for an office visit for what I thought was an ear infection. My professional wanted to use a Waterpik to clean my ear canal. I came home and used the elephant ear with great results.
customer_reviews.author: somebunny

customer_reviews.title: Hurt my ear.
customer_reviews.text: Hurt my ear. I was very careful, tried to keep the water pressure extremely low by pumping very slowly. Still it hurt my ear. After a few days it recovered, but I would never take this chance again. You can definitely hurt your ear using this thing, even if you use it correctly. It is dangerous to mess around with this thing.
customer_reviews.author: Yeti777

customer_reviews.title: Just buy it
customer_reviews.text: Yeah, so this thing is amazing. I had an ear infection 6 months ago that caused some damage. In the process, my ear wax production went way up, and covered my eardrum. I can hear, but everything sounds a bit muffled, and i have pretty bad tinnitus. Bought this, used it, and the first treatment brought out what I imagine total was about a dime sized amount of wax. I'm not done yet. I'm going to put some drops in, wait a bit, and try again. But it's already clear to me that this thing works.
customer_reviews.author: ajones1216

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Product
customer_reviews.text: I had never tried removing wax build-up from my ears. But over the last few months, I was always finding myself trying to pop my ears, like you do when in an airplane, to improve my hearing. So I knew I probably needed to cleanse my ears of wax build-up. I bought the Elephant Ear Wash system after reading the many positive reviews. Let me tell you, this thing works like a charm. I only used warm water, without any type of solution mixed in. Within 30 seconds of using in each ear, all the years of built-up wax came flushing out. I can actually hear great again. Buy this product. It's well worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: Socal

customer_reviews.title: Leaks
customer_reviews.text: If I could give this zero stars I would! It leaked everywhere and you can’t return it. Despite the leaking I kept trying anyway because I saw several encouraging videos online. This product was a complete waste of money for us it didn’t clean my ears or any of my 3 kids. Guess we all had immaculately clean ears already.
customer_reviews.author: Jane

customer_reviews.title: Excellent!!
customer_reviews.text: Would have been a 5 star review but it was suposed to be free same day delivery, i ordered early Saturday morning and it didn't get delivered until Monday afternoon. Despite that the product itself worked fantastic. My wife's ears were completely impacted with wax. I did make up some wax softner with 2 parts olive oil and 1 part peroxide and let each side soak for 20 min+ then flushed them out. Only took one bottle per side to get them clean. I had also bought an otoscope to look inside her ear. She went from completly impacted (could barely hear) to clean as a whistle (loud noises!!) for 30$ you cant beat it!!
customer_reviews.author: Sliger

customer_reviews.title: ***30 day return policy but they don’t respond to messages***
customer_reviews.text: I think most of the positive reviews must be bought. Not only was this contraption simply constructed but it didn’t do a thing for my ears. I still can’t hear and I still feel like they’re clogged. I followed all the reviews for advice, I watched numerous YouTube videos, tried ear wax softener and I tried a few different solutions. And to add insult to injury the sellers communication is nonexistent. Very unhappy since I’m out of $30 that could’ve went towards a dr visit.
customer_reviews.author: A.hill

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING!!
customer_reviews.text: I get plugged ears all the time. I have a standing 3 month appt with my ENT to get my ears vacuumed. On a vacation, at a walk in clinic to get my ears syringed, the dr suggested I buy this. It has changed my life. No more waiting for a dr’s appt, I just do it myself. It works like magic. If you have small ear canals that are always getting clogged, this is for you!!!
customer_reviews.author: Julie Lomond

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is a wonderful product. Yes, it is a (very) glorified spray bottle, but whatever that blue tube is, is fantastic! This has probably saved me hundreds of dollars in doctors' visits for cleaning my 6 and 4 year olds' ears. I watched a pretty entertaining video on YouTube which showed a nurse using this on a teenage boy, and then watched it with my young children so that they would know what to expect and not be scared. And it works! Oh my goodness, does it work!!! It's pretty entertaining and satisfying, to see all those impacted ear wax clusters come right out, too. Even the kids think it's awesome!
customer_reviews.author: Comfy Mommy

customer_reviews.title: Did not work for me
customer_reviews.text: I followed all instructions and this did not work for me, it is also very painful. I would not recommend this product...
customer_reviews.author: A.T.

customer_reviews.title: This thing works great. A few months ago my right ear plugged ...
customer_reviews.text: This thing works great. A few months ago my right ear plugged and the local urgent care opened it up using a syringe with a soft IV catheter on the end, this is exactly the same idea but can be used solo at home. I just used warm water and got a giant chunk o wax from the left ear. The Urgent care used saline and hydrogen peroxide but warm water worked using this device. Highly recommended, though do follow directions, as you might experience some dizziness so be prepared for it.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Salyer

customer_reviews.title: Solid Build. Its a bit challenging to do the ...
customer_reviews.text: Solid Build. Its a bit challenging to do the ear cleaning on your own but it is doable. On the first week, I used it on the daily bases when i'm in the shower. Just add warm water OR vinergar-warm water mixture. I noticed the huge difference and improvement on my hearing (no more ringing noise) after 2nd-3rd day of once a day use. Now I just clean my ears on a monthly bases for maintenance while i shower.
customer_reviews.author: 1 Fire, Main.

customer_reviews.title: It Works Great
customer_reviews.text: I have always had issues with my left ear because of wax buildup and the ear canal to narrow to naturally remove the wax. My ear would constantly plug up so bad I couldn't hear anything out of my left ear . I have used Debrox for years with a small ear syringe with limited success. After I softened the ear wax with Debrox I used this system and it removed the wax that the ear syringe could never touch. I highly recommend this product
customer_reviews.author: ITMan

customer_reviews.title: IT WORKS!
customer_reviews.text: Ok I know it’s gross but it worked!!! I had been dealing with some clogging issues in my left ear which sometimes caused it to do this weird drumming sensation when I heard certain noises. I used Detrox for 7 minutes on each ear last night and then this morning gave this thing a try. I wasn’t even half way through the bottle when this HUGE chunk of impacted earwax came out! At first I wasn’t sure it was working so I went to feel in my ear and this giant ball was sitting right there for me to pluck out with my fingers. So gross!... but wow, the difference is awesome! So happy I have this a try.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly F.

customer_reviews.title: Psoriasis Help
customer_reviews.text: It is a pump and it works well for cleaning the ears. For me, it didn't do much "removal", so I was hesitant to say it worked. But, I found out later, my problem is caused not by wax build up but by psoriasis. If you have psoriasis and you are suffering from ear problems, ask the doctor about checking your ears for psoriasis. What happens is that the skin build up can actually cause ear problems, and it cannot be removed quite like wax, though this device along with some slight vinegar or hydrogen peroxide helps keep them cleared. Who knew?
customer_reviews.author: Leah D. Love

customer_reviews.title: Low cost solution to a big problem.
customer_reviews.text: I have spent a lot of time and money through the years,having my ears flushed, vacuumed and plundered to clear the wax so I could hear again. So I got one of these systems, used it in the shower, as another buyer suggested. I found that it isn't necessary to insert the tip all the way in, nor is it important to be forceful. I gently squeezed the handle a number of times in succession and the most icky old wax came pouring out. I tried it on the opposite ear, and even more " stuff" came out. My tinnitus is better, and hearing is MUCH clearer. Let's hear it for Doctor Easy!!!!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Marty

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I have tried this several times, but have not had any visible residue come out of my ear. I believe I was spraying it too hard, as my ear hurt a bit after. I did have to trim the straw that went into my ear canal, as it went to far for my comfort. I believe this would work well for those who have not let the buildup get too bad yet. It is messy, so I recommend doing it in the shower. I believe using wax softening drops before using would also be helpful.
customer_reviews.author: Lori

customer_reviews.title: I was soooo hoping this would work
customer_reviews.text: I was sooo hoping this would work to remove the ear wax that is preventing me from hearing from my left ear. I used drops for several days before trying the ear washer. I used very warm water with some peroxide and tried several times, but no luck. A couple of times I became quite dizzy, but the sensation went away fairly quickly. I have given in and made an appointment with an ENT - but I have to wait almost a month to get in. In the meantime I will give this contraption another try. Maybe my luck will change!
customer_reviews.author: EMC

customer_reviews.title: No return!- Instant buyers remorse $30 for a spray bottle!
customer_reviews.text: Will not let you return this item, buyer beware. When you receive the ear washer you have instant buyers remorse $30 for a spray bottle save your money, and buy a $10 dollar one if it breaks so what you could buy 2 more for the price of this. Will not let you return, I cannot say this enough. Such GREED needs to STOP!
customer_reviews.author: Big Mac

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this after my daughter's doctor used a similar bottle on her ears. I have struggled for years with wax build-up to the point of not being able to hear. I bought this, used the recommended solution of water and white vinegar, and my hearing returned to normal! I got quite a bit out. This is really great for those of us who usually have to go to the doctor for this.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs Snips

customer_reviews.title: What is lurking inside your ears? Find out with the Elephant Ear Washer!
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this on Amazon after my left ear felt plugged. I'm one of those obsessive people who cleans their ears every day. Also have allergies that make my ears itch, so against medical advice, I used to use Q-Tips to "scratch" inside my ears. After buying and using the Elephant Ear Washer, I will never use Q-Tips for my ears again. I was amazed at the nasty stuff that drained into the ear basin after using the washer. My ears feel SO clean now. Make sure to buy a pack of disposable tips because you'll need them. The washer only comes with 3 tips and you can't reuse them.
customer_reviews.author: Cali Mother of 3

customer_reviews.title: works amazing!
customer_reviews.text: This item is awesome! After hearing my husband complain for 2 weeks about a clogged ear and not doing anything about it, I ordered this neat gadget. It looks simple and works simply but produces fabulous results. He filled it with warm water in the shower and within 2 minutes was able to open his ear. He has a curvy ear canal too that traps wax a lot so I was relieved it work. Would definitely recommend. Saves a lot of money on doctors visits.
customer_reviews.author: redsonja

customer_reviews.title: Worked wonderfully!
customer_reviews.text: Worked wonderfully on my husband's ear! He's been having hearing issues lately and so we saw an ad on this and decided to try it. After letting some ear drops sit in his ear for 10 mins we started squirting away with warm water. Low and behold chunks being pushed out and he can hear again!!! Highly recommended. As a heads up you may want to have something to help guide or pick the ear wax out, depending on the size of the wax.
customer_reviews.author: Mai Yang

customer_reviews.title: The best home wax removal product!
customer_reviews.text: I have always had ear problems and have gone to the doctors many times over the years to have them clean the wax out, which is never a fun experience. I’ve used ear candles , wax softeners and many other home remedies. None have worked like this. I only used warm water and within the first couple of squirts from the bottle , wax came out.by far the best home wax removal product I’ve ever used!
customer_reviews.author: Lori Ruther

customer_reviews.title: This is a GREAT PRODUCT and would recommend it to anyone having a ...
customer_reviews.text: My son gets extra wax in his ears, and i first saw this product when we went to the doctor office. The doctor told me all about it and where to get it. I bought it and use it 2x so far. When my son tells me he can't hear out of his ear. I do what the doctor told me.. to fill it up with half warm water and half peroxide and put the elephant ear bottle in his ear, while his head is tilted. Wax build up comes out every time. This is a GREAT PRODUCT and would recommend it to anyone having a problem with wax build up in their ears.
customer_reviews.author: Mack

customer_reviews.title: Best thing ever for people with constant ear wax build up.
customer_reviews.text: Love this thing. I had a really bad case of impacted ear wax build-up and the bottle system cleared it in 20 mins max. Personally, I just used warm water to flush out the wax, but next time I'll try using hydrogen peroxide as suggested. For anyone out there who has problems with ear wax build-up, I highly recommend you to purchase this and cut down on your over-priced ENT doctor bills. Truly, I saved so much from just this simple product even with shipping. (PS. I live literally a whole ocean away from USA and still think it's worth the shipping)
customer_reviews.author: Valerie

customer_reviews.title: Highly effective
customer_reviews.text: This thing actually works. I was trying to avoid going to the doctor and bought a bunch of ear drops, and other ear irrigation products. This is the only thing that actually got the job done in the end. It's such a simple idea yet effecting. I ended up putting a little hydrogen peroxide with warm water into mine and it did an amazing job. It was like getting brand new ears. Be careful with this thing though. It is powerful. I could easily see how someone could hurt themselves if they were careless while using this.
customer_reviews.author: Jeryl Scott Pierro

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t disappoint!
customer_reviews.text: This worked perfectly! After receiving the product I realized that the solution and mix did not come with the product; however, the instructions offer the alternative of utilizing white vinegar to dilute with water. I opted for Peroxide since I had that on hand and mixed it with warm water instead. I flushed my ear rapidly and my earwax debris was removed rather quickly. Good product and I would recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good ear washer
customer_reviews.text: Unit works well for what it does, just have to come up with best mix with the warm water! I'm 70 years old and it's Easy to use by my self with out help. Have been using unit once a week with good results. I do feel the difference in my ears and I know it helped my hearing! Good product! I would recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis Hasenfus

customer_reviews.title: Approved by four generations!
customer_reviews.text: Our doctor used this tool on our son to remove excess ear wax and it couldn't be any easier to use at home - I've used it on the whole family. For the little ones I do it in the bathtub or kitchen sink so that you don't have to worry about water running out of their ears. For my 92 yo grandfather and 40 something husband the kitchen stool worked great. Just remember to add slightly warm water (cold/room temperature water may make the patient dizzy).
customer_reviews.author: Holly

customer_reviews.title: but this was so awesome I felt compelled to do it
customer_reviews.text: I NEVER have written a review, but this was so awesome I felt compelled to do it! Every year or so I get waxy, itchy, painful ears. I have to put special drops in a few days before I go to the doctors to soften the wax and THEN I go into the doctors office to have it flushed out. Finally relief. Well, I tried this on a whim based on the reviews and I was shocked and relieved. I opened it, followed the instructions with the vinegar solution and within 5 minutes I was the proud owner of 2 large clumps of wax and fabulous feeling ears. LOVE LOVE LOVE this product!!!
customer_reviews.author: T

customer_reviews.title: ear wax sucks
customer_reviews.text: I produce a lot of ear wax. The rubber bulb thing that is typically what you might use to remove ear wax didn't really work all that well for me. This works great. The water comes from the water bottle so you don't have to refill it after each squirt like you do with the rubber bulb. This thing has a little attachment that goes into you ear which can be cut down to the length that you are comfortable with. The rubber hose gives it some flexiblity so you can do this yourself and be over a sink or what have you. Its easy to use and not uncomfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Garrett

customer_reviews.title: Best ear cleaning product ever
customer_reviews.text: This is by far the best ear cleaning product I've ever used. I just used it with warm water and it was very effective at clearing out a significant "clog" of wax. I'd recommend you also use this was an otoscope so you can see what you're doing and determine how much cleaning is necessary.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff M

customer_reviews.title: Same One My Doctor Uses
customer_reviews.text: Okay, let's begin by saying this is very expensive for what it is. However, it's the only game in town. My doctor's office uses the same exact product. So I will make up in office visit co-pays its excessive price. BTW, don't forget you need to put a tip at the end of the blue flexible tube. I had someone else do it for me and they forgot this step. It doesn't do anything without the tip. I had to go back to the doctor and look to see the way they did before I finally figured it out. LOL
customer_reviews.author: G. Girard

customer_reviews.title: Works better than ear candles
customer_reviews.text: Even though I bought it, I was skeptical and had not used it for almost two years. So this bottle set had been just laying around, and I had only been using ear candles. However, at some point no candles were able to help and I couldn't hear well; so I decided to finally give this one a try. It actually worked great and removed a solidified wax that no candle could. Works great!
customer_reviews.author: Svetlana Nv

customer_reviews.title: Effective alternative for plugged ears.
customer_reviews.text: This ear washer system is incredibly useful if you're prone to getting plugged ears. I've used it several times and saved expensive visits to the doctor's office just to get my ears flushed out. Be careful when you use it, because sometimes the pressure of the water can hurt a little bit as you're flushing out the ear. I wish they made this with a syringe style rather than a spray bottle because those systems feel a bit more gentle on the ear. The bottom line, however, is that this system has been effective for me, and it's easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Leslie D.

customer_reviews.title: Great pressure but odd number of ear pieces
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to help clean out my husband’s ears. We used some drops first then used this to squirt his ears. The pressure was prefect. The only downfall is that there are only 3 pieces to attached to the end, and you’re supposedly to toss them out after each ear use. Only 3? Who has an odd number of ears? That’s 1.5 uses only.
customer_reviews.author: writer1986

customer_reviews.title: Works as described!
customer_reviews.text: I usually have to have my ears irrigated about every 6 months. I end up loosing most of my hearing in one or both of my ears. I slept thru my alarm this morning and was almost late for work because of this. I just got my elephant ear washer system in the mail the other day. Used it before going to work. In a matter of minutes I had cleared out enough wax to probably make a small candle :). It definitely works as described! Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Steve G.

customer_reviews.title: Get ready to hear like the bionic woman!
customer_reviews.text: The reviews really are all true. This product is a lifesaver! Now, what came out of my ears wasn't as crazy as some of the user pics that have been uploaded. But it still worked wonders. I really feel like I have supersonic hearing now. Who knew this is how you're supposed to hear?? And the product was easy to use, all I used in mine was warm water. And it doesn't make that big of a mess if you do it over a sink. Love love love this product! I ordered it & paid for the 1 day shipping cause I needed some relief fast, and it came on time. Couldn't be happier!
customer_reviews.author: Daniel M

customer_reviews.title: Go for it!
customer_reviews.text: While this is MUCH easier to use with two people (one to do the squirting and one to receive the squirting), it technically can be done on your own. My ears are super waxy, and after about three rounds of warm water and 1 tablespoon white vinegar on each ear, so much wax came out. Seriously, it was incredible. One of those disgusting-yet-satisfying things, you know? Heads up, I do recommend leaning over the sink or using a towel - things can get messy.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Works like a charm!!
customer_reviews.text: This product was EXACTLY what I needed! My ears were bothering me for weeks. The doctors office told me they were blocked and to use hydrogen peroxide to remove, but it did not work. My ears felt plugged and like I had balloons in my ears. After the doctor turned out to be a dead end, I decided to take matters in to my own hands. This product worked perfectly. 2 large pieces came out of both ears as well as broken up smaller pieces as well. I instantly could hear better, and the balloon-like feeling FINALLY went away!! I was shocked how well I could hear afterwards! I recommend this product to any/everyone!
customer_reviews.author: amoro12

customer_reviews.title: Game changer!
customer_reviews.text: I've never written an Amazon review before, but this product calls for it. I was spending lots of time and money dealing with ear wax blockages that drove me crazy. None of the various practitioners I saw, including an ear specialist, mentioned this amazing device, and it's a huge shame the medical establishment doesn't promote it. Washing my ears out professionally was a huge waste of healthcare resources. Now, the Elephant Ear Washer allows me to easily and quickly clean out my ears by myself at home. It's become a household staple. I can't even guess at how much time and money it's saved me in urgent care and other medical visits just to wash out my ears.
customer_reviews.author: Peter M.

customer_reviews.title: WAY CHEAPER THAN A DOCTOR!  Works!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this maybe a year ago hoping I wouldn't need it, but I'd had to pay a doctor a fortune to clean my ears out and figured it was an insurance policy. Long and short, needed it BADLY, used it, and it worked BRILLIANTLY! I love it. I'd give it ten starts if I could. $30 seems like a bit much for a spray bottle with a cool attachment, but it saved me hundreds and worked every bit as well as the doctor. THANK YOU ELEPHANT!
customer_reviews.author: greg wilson

customer_reviews.title: Buy this now if....
customer_reviews.text: Supersonic hearing engaged! Again! I won't attach the pics of what was removed bc frankly I was disgusted... Let's just say it was a combination of cotton from q-tip use and wax... It cam out of my ear instantly after weeks of frustration and plugged up ears. I bought based on reviews and couldn't be happier. Ears plugged up from allergies or who knows what? But this now! The end...
customer_reviews.author: Jimmy James

customer_reviews.title: Wow
customer_reviews.text: Very skeptical at first but works great!! I have lots of wax problems and need a good flushing at least every 3-6 months. You do get quite wet but well worth a good flush! Use it in the shower...
customer_reviews.author: Beth Brodt

customer_reviews.title: Perfect with those who have a chronic ear wax problem
customer_reviews.text: I used to get a lot of ear wax build up as a kid, mainly because I used in-ear headphones a lot. Overtime, I would end up having to go to the doctor's office just to pump my ears. This is the same thing they use there. Easy to use (warm water and/or soap) with a powerful squirt. Just be careful not to squirt too hard =)
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: He said it made his ears feel worse. Now he can barely hear out if the ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband to clean his ears out. He said it made his ears feel worse. Now he can barely hear out if the one ear. I feel bad because I was just trying to help him. Bummer I can't return it either.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My MD husband's ear got unplugged with this in no time!
customer_reviews.text: My husband, who is an MD, had an ear clogged with wax, so we got Doctor Easy's ear washer. He filled the bottle with warm water, put the tip on, and got in the shower. He held the tip in his ear and had me squeeze the handle to squirt the water in. After a few squirts I was startled to see what to me was a BIG plug of earwax come out (the size of the ear canal). Wow! He was delighted at instantly being able to hear out of that ear again. We highly recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: maureen G

customer_reviews.title: Worked wonderful. My husband had a wax blockage in his ...
customer_reviews.text: Worked wonderful. My husband had a wax blockage in his ear. (Does not like going to a doctor) Watched a video on YOUTUBE showing how this was used. Worked great, very very little discomfort, removed the wax blockage, and my husband had no residual effects. Loved this product. I do recommend ordering the ear cup that catches the water and wax, otherwise you do have a mess.
customer_reviews.author: Mama C

customer_reviews.title: All I can say is WOW
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely changed my life. I haven't been able to hear out of my left ear for about 2 years. I always dreaded going to the doctor and paying a large amount of money for an ear lavage so I decided to purchase this product. It took about 10 full bottles to release all the crap was inside of my ear. I could not believe the amount of wax build up that I had accumulated over the past couple of years. I will never use a q-tip again. Thank god for this product. I literally cried because I could hea again. Definitely try this product. You will not be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: natalie graham

customer_reviews.title: Really liked the Elephant Ear Washer Bottle
customer_reviews.text: Works better than things I have used in the past. Used Debrox earwax drops as directed first, then washed out my husband's ears. Big & little chunks of wax came out with little effort. He wears hearing aides, so ear wax tends to build up. I am a retired nurse & liked this irrigation system much better than using the large irrigating syringes I have used in the Outpatient clinic. Easier to use & more success.
customer_reviews.author: Carol

customer_reviews.title: I could hear again!!
customer_reviews.text: You may be thinking why pay $30.00 for a spray bottle? The fact of the matter is, this really works and is worth every penny. The little squeeze bulb that they include in a typical ear wax kit will not do the job because it simply doesn't have enough pressure to get the impacted ear wax out. Within 5 minutes of receiving this bottle, I used it and was hearing clearly again. What a relief. Totally worth it.
customer_reviews.author: SJ

customer_reviews.title: Cost effective, easy and  safe ear wax removal.
customer_reviews.text: My ears were clogged for a while due to the impact amount. The audiologist said, "you need to go to the doctors to have all that wax removed before we can conduct a hearing exam. Instead this product was ordered and the next time the audiologist checked my ears I was ready for the exam. Cost less than than paying the doctor for ear wax removal. Passed the exam!!
customer_reviews.author: Brooky Brooks

customer_reviews.title: Didn't really do anything for me
customer_reviews.text: This product didn't really do anything for me, and it was basically a waste of money. It made my ears feel waterlogged and had no effect on ear wax. I tried to use it with wax removal droplets -- same result. Now it just sits around my house, totally unused. Maybe it's the kind of thing that works for some people and not others, but I can't recommend it based on my experience.
customer_reviews.author: L. Naugle

customer_reviews.title: This thing WORKS!
customer_reviews.text: I didn't have much faith in this washer when I bought it. I thought for sure it would hurt spraying water in my ear. It didn't! This is what I got out of one of my husbands ear after the third wash. We did 3 in a row on each ear on him. I was easily able to do my own ears also. I highly recommend this item! Well worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: Claudia P. Williams

customer_reviews.title: This was the ticket for me
customer_reviews.text: After an am treatment with no results a pm treatment (recommended drops plus one spray bottle full of solution) resulted with "pea" sized wad of wax with small hairs imbedded coming out of my right ear. Water draining out has always sounded different in my right ear from my left ear. It helped me to hear others describe about learning one ear canal was shaped differently than their other.
customer_reviews.author: Darrell Fritz

customer_reviews.title: Very effective
customer_reviews.text: I had read several reviews before I decided to buy this product and I’m glad I did. Instructions were easy to follow, easy to use and very effective. I was taken aback by the amount of earwax debris that came out. I used this kit by myself and didn’t find it necessary to use a basin to collect the water that was flowing from my ear
customer_reviews.author: Raymond G Kriete

customer_reviews.title: It's Like a Small Rock Quarry Gets Flushed Out!
customer_reviews.text: I had tried what seemed like everything to clear my ears of earwax. The first time I used this, it felt like a rock quarry was flowing out of my ears. Large chunks of compressed earwax came flowing out of my ear canal. My hearing improved so much that I don't have to use the closed captioning on the TV anymore. I use this at least every month just to keep things clear. I'm still amazed at what forms up in that short of time.
customer_reviews.author: J. Parduhn

customer_reviews.title: just didn't work for me. I have an ear ...
customer_reviews.text: just didn't work for me. I have an ear that is clogged and I tried this 3x and nothing came out. I used ear wax softener for several days prior to using this as well. Make sure not to use cold water!!!
customer_reviews.author: jennifer justis

customer_reviews.title: Very effective
customer_reviews.text: Worked perfectly to help resolve 4 month long ear episode of in and out if dr offices to get my ear cleaned out and using antibiotics to stave off infection. Had to do it 3 times in 3 weeks but finally my ear has stayed unclogged for over a month. Swimmers ear solution made the difference i think after using it to keep the inside dry so it could drain and heal. Just be sure to be gentle and listen to your body cues- ie, if it hurts, dont proceed.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Great item
customer_reviews.text: I don't like the tiny little tube that goes into the ear canal. I wish it was shaped a little different. But the instructions are clear and easy to follow. I did get a little dizzy even though my water was VERY WARM, so just make sure that you do this sitting down. It resolved within a few minutes.
customer_reviews.author: gmoney3689

customer_reviews.title: Works Great. Period!
customer_reviews.text: This product solved my ear wax problems. Period. I had tried everything - rinses, doo-dads to stick in your ear, bulbs to shoot water in your ear, shooting water in my ear in the shower, Hydrogen Peroxide; all with negligible results. Follow the instructions; nice warm water and vinegar eliminated my daily ear blockages and loss of hearing. I use it everyday; and when I forget; it's been so effective I can go a day without an ear plugging up.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Christensen

customer_reviews.title: Wow it works!
customer_reviews.text: Wow it works! I had to use ear wax softener for a week. But I finally got all this compacted wax out of my ear and I can hear! Buy this! Warm water and make sure you soften the wax for a few days maybe a week. I had to fill up like 12 bottles but it finally came out and saved me a few hundred dollars at the doctors.
customer_reviews.author: Shawna Riley

customer_reviews.title: This is the single best purchase I have made on Amazon, period.
customer_reviews.text: This wonder tool arrived at my door about twenty minutes ago. I paid for same day shipping because my ear was plugged, I was having trouble hearing, and it was starting to hurt a bit. Within ten minutes of the item arriving at my door, my plugged ear is now completely clean. No pain, no big mess really, just did it over the kitchen sink. I had to go to an urgent care a couple of years ago when both my ears got plugged. For 35 bucks including shipping, this is about a million times better than a trip to the doctor. Where has this thing been all my life?
customer_reviews.author: Big E

customer_reviews.title: Want waterlogged ears and a headache? Oh boy, don't I have the product for you!!!
customer_reviews.text: Product fell apart quickly, the metal clamp is not secure, and the water started running down the side of the bottle after a few pumps. Also very painful. Don't use if you have tmj. Probably took all of $2 to make, what a scam. DON'T BE FOOLED, THERE ARE NO RETURNS FOR THIS ITEM. 30 day guarantee is such a lie.
customer_reviews.author: Savvyaf

customer_reviews.title: It works!!!
customer_reviews.text: I have tiny ear canals so getting them clean is always an issue. After being unable to hear clearly for several weeks and not being able to use the previous bulb I had, I want online and ordered this. I just got it and used it and it completed cleared my ear canal with 10 squeezes of the handle. THANK YOU!!
customer_reviews.author: Tracey Jones

customer_reviews.title: No more excuses on why my 10-year old won't listen
customer_reviews.text: My son was complaining that he couldn't hear out of one ear. He's had problems in the past with wax buildup, but I couldn't find the syringe the doctor gave us last time. So, I ordered this. Amazing what it cleaned out of there! Absolutely disgusting!!! Best part... he immediately said "I can hear again!!"
customer_reviews.author: K. Andrews

customer_reviews.title: Best wash outside the urgent care.
customer_reviews.text: I've had wax build up in my ears for years it's a very frustrating problem. I am constantly washing them out and using debrox to try and clear it up at certain times of the year. I had gone to the urgent care last year and they used this device and I've never had such an effective treatment. I was blocked up again this week but don't have the time to go and get it done there but found this on Amazon and I couldn't be happier. Got it mixed the recommended solution and oh my do I feel so much better. I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Ann W

customer_reviews.title: Just like my doctor used
customer_reviews.text: I had impacted ear wax and suddenly could barely hear out of one ear. Ear candles didn't work. Q-tips didn't work. Went to the doctor and they used this; with warm water. Worked GREAT! Low impact and effective. So i got one for the future, just in case...
customer_reviews.author: Michael Hurd

customer_reviews.title: It Works!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use. I've been treating my daughter with Debrox for several days but it seemed to make her hearing worse. I bought this product last night to have it delivered today. I figured if this didn't work, it was time to head to the pediatrician. It arrived less than an hour ago. We've already used it and she can hear clearly again. I was impressed at the contents her ears could hold. Highly recommend using this in combination with the Debrox.
customer_reviews.author: Just Me

customer_reviews.title: Lifesaver
customer_reviews.text: My kid is prone to lots of ear wax. This works AWESOMELY to remove it. Went to a specialist once cause she had packed wax and this is what they used. No special tools just this. Now we are the specialists!
customer_reviews.author: g8tors09

customer_reviews.title: Use Distilled Water or Risk Ear Infection
customer_reviews.text: This works as advertised, but beware! Use distilled water or you will likely get a nasty ear infection. I got an one 3 days after using this. I had never aspirated my ears before, and rarely get ear infections. It sent into my nasal cavity and throat as well. I gave this 5 stars regardless, since it works as asvertised and arriced in good conditon.
customer_reviews.author: Heisenberg

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t work
customer_reviews.text: Did nothing for me. I was super excited to try. I used it exactly as instructed. It came with a 30 day money back gaurentee but amazon said I can’t return it? I’m probably doing that aspect wrong but I am bummed it didn’t work.
customer_reviews.author: Cmconrardy

customer_reviews.title: She has terrible wax build up
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my mom. She has terrible wax build up. Wasn't sure this would work but it does! She did this every night for the first week. The chunks began flowing out by day three. Do not use this if you have a whole in your eardrum. It clearly states that on the package. Heed the warning.
customer_reviews.author: English Cat

customer_reviews.title: superior pumpcare
customer_reviews.text: This product removed a sizable amount of earwax that could not easily be removed manually. The process was relatively quick and painless. For Americans that are enrolled in high deductible health care plans and lack decent coverage, this device is a godsend. With each pull of this well crafted squirt handle, I could hear myself making hearing great again.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Rowe

customer_reviews.title: yes Does it work great? yes
customer_reviews.text: Is is overpriced? yes Does it work great? yes. I've been getting my right ear cleaned about every 18 mos. for was buildup and at the last visit my doctor said I should go online and just order the bottle myself. I took his advice and it worked great. I recommend getting the ear basin as well because it makes it easy to keep water from going everywhere. I ordered the Debrox drops as well but did not even open them because I decided to try a mixture of warm water (2/3) and hydrogen peroxide (1/3) first. That mixture worked fine. I warmed the water up to about 105 degrees.
customer_reviews.author: Harry M. Simpkins

customer_reviews.title: 6 stars
customer_reviews.text: Out. Standing. I was hearing in mono for 2 months. Weeks of using the over-the-counter treatment, and two visits to my primary care physician with no improvement. Literally 30 seconds with this bad boy leaning over my kitchen sink and stereo was restored. If you are looking at this product, you should buy this product.
customer_reviews.author: Noah Binder

customer_reviews.title: This worked immediately. My ear was so clogged that ...
customer_reviews.text: This worked immediately. My ear was so clogged that I couldn't hear and was plagued by a continuous ringing noise. I tried using debrox for a few days but it did not fix my problem. Massive amounts of earwax came out of my ear in just a few squeezes of the handle. After slowly going through most of the bottle while taking breaks, it completely cleaned my ear out. Only needed very warm tap water
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: OMG this worked soooo good for me
customer_reviews.text: OMG this worked soooo good for me. I used it in the shower, filled it with warm water and inserted the tip in pretty far, but not enough to hurt. And the key for me was the force of the water pushing the wax. Try to go as hard as you can handle, it doesn't hurt, but it may feel a little weird. But I'll tell you what! My bad ear is now my good ear and soooo much wax came out I was shocked!!!! I'm still in shock! haha
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Ehhh. I'm not sure if i have really clean ...
customer_reviews.text: Ehhh. I'm not sure if i have really clean ears or if this product doesn't work. I saw pictures from other users and a bunch of icky stuff came out but i used this several times and nothing came out at all. I followed the instructions perfectly. It might just be my clean ears to blame, I'm not really sure. Be careful to sit down while doing this (as instructed) because it does make you a little dizzy as they say
customer_reviews.author: Christea

customer_reviews.title: Instant and glorious relief!
customer_reviews.text: This product is so simple and yet so effective! I was having trouble hearing in my right ear so I used this. It cleared out BOTH ears of clumps of wax that hardened in my ear canal and I heard so clearly that it was almost like HD sound vs mono! And though you feel pressure when squirting, it doesn't hurt. I used warm filtered water and a little hydrogen peroxide to help loosen the wax and prevent infection. I recommend this to everyone to keep your ears clear and healthy!
customer_reviews.author: Gypsycyn

customer_reviews.title: Good prouduct
customer_reviews.text: This was ordered when my hearing aid provider would not send it to me while in Afghanistan where the dust was so bad that my ears clogged up rendering my $6,400 hearing aids of no use. They are listed as Professional use only on the advertisement so she refused. They work well abroad. In the states I have never needed anything like this however some do and this works well with warm water and some alcohol. By the way they recommend sitting so maybe use one of those banana shaped pans like you get in the hospital to catch the water. There is a chance that this may get you dizzy while standing in the shower...
customer_reviews.author: John T

customer_reviews.title: Feel Great to Hear!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I'm so glad I got this today!!! 10 minutes after recieving I fixed my water solution with 3% hydrogen peroxide and immediately flushed out my ear that was clogged up!! This thing is amazing and perfect!!!! Cleaned my other ear and got a huge chunk out! Feels great to hear again
customer_reviews.author: colby midkiff

customer_reviews.title: Works!!
customer_reviews.text: This worked for me the first try. I bought this when one of my ears got clogged but when it got here it got unclogged. I forgot about. I saw it last night and got curious if I had ear wax stuck inside so I gave it a try and a huge chunk of the wax came out. I was so amazed I decided to try it on my other ear and same thing happened. It blew my mind. No more Q-tips for me!!
customer_reviews.author: ilyana

customer_reviews.title: Waste of Money
customer_reviews.text: This is not a "Complete Ear Washer System." It's a bottle with a hose attached. It comes without cleaning solution. Look elsewhere if you want an actual complete ear cleaning kit. Also, this item is not eligible for returns, so if you're looking to pay $30 for a $3 bottle proceed with your purchase. You can find actual complete ear cleaning kits for the same price or less.
customer_reviews.author: Deep South Auto Parts

customer_reviews.title: so disgusting but such a relief
customer_reviews.text: This has brought me so much relief! I went to the doctors about a month and half ago due to congestion and strep throat. The doctor told me my ears were very clogged and gave me a few suggestions of how to clean them out at home. He also said clogged ears delay healing. I went home and tried a couple things and nothing really worked. I literally used the ear washer bottle 10 minutes ago and WOW! Some nasty wax came out of my ears... so disgusting but such a relief. My ears feel 5 lbs lighter!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it
customer_reviews.text: In Theory this is a great idea. Unfortunately, the execution was done very poorly. The spray when it comes out even when you do it gently is quite uncomfortable. We've tried angling it differently, but no effect. It's cheaper to just put your ear under the shower spray. More comfortable to.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing results
customer_reviews.text: I was introduced to this during a physical exam by my doctor a couple of years ago and finally decided to get one for use at home. I've previously used the little kits you find at the drug store, which include some drops and a bulb syringe. Those work, but this thing is amazing. I use IEMs for listening to music and can't stand the constant appearance of ear wax/crud. For anyone, who experiences appreciable ear wax build-up, this system is priceless.
customer_reviews.author: R. Martin

customer_reviews.title: Not for me
customer_reviews.text: I couldn’t hear for about 7 hours and nothing came out of my ears. Once my hearing was back water was stuck for the whole day and night. It drove me nuts.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy Hilliard

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: While I agree with other reviewers that the price is exorbitant for a plastic bottle and tubing, it did work well and saved me a $175 doctor's office visit--yep, that's with insurance (thanks for sticking it to the working class, obamacare). Apparently you used to get quite a few tips with this unit, but now they charge extra for those, too.
customer_reviews.author: Phl.413

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product/Great Quality!
customer_reviews.text: This product is phenomenal!! I am so happy I was able to find this as it has saved me from a expensive trip to the doctors. Very simple directions to follow and made wax remove easy and quick. Would definitely recommend this if you have constant ear issues like me and need to flush out buildup/clogged ears.
customer_reviews.author: Eric

product_meta.title: Elephant Ear Washer Bottle System by Doctor Easy
feature_bullets: Professional ear cleaning at home - invented by a physician, the elephant ear washer bottle system was designed to provide professional level ear wax removal for easy to use in-home usage.

Eliminate ear wax - Ear wax buildup and blockage can cause partial hearing loss and general discomfort, It is even the number one cause of hearing aid failure. The elephant ear washer is a quick, effective treatment for excess ear wax buildup that can be done in-home.
Easy to use - fill the bottle with an ear cleaning solution, twist on a disposable tip, and squeeze the trigger handle to spray the solution into the ear canal.
One handed operation - Easily position and operate the elephant ear washer with a single hand, allowing you to use your other hand for an otoscope or other instruments.
Complete ear washer system - each order contains the elephant ear washer bottle system with three disposable tips.
